description:
Nolan has been off enjoying some time in the sun and trying to work on his tan. He's still pretty pale, but is looking a little more sun kissed than he was the last time we saw him.
"Welcome back! You haven't been here in a while."
"It's been a good minute," Nolan joked.
"You on the other hand," I directed my attention to Robert, "have been here, like, once a week!"
"Yeah I have. Once a week for like the past month."
"So you like us here... or you just really like dick in your ass."
"I love coming back," Robert replied. "I'm just going to say that."
The grin on his face was enough to answer that one. He couldn't keep his eyes off Nolan. The instant they took their clothes off, Robert went right for Nolan's nipples (and we all know how sensitive his nipples are). Nolan was impressed with the quick tongue action from Robert.
"It's starting to get hard," Robert pointed out.
"Oh he'll know when I get hard..." Nolan smiled.
And Robert did! He seemed to enjoy it too, as he stayed rock hard as Nolan fucked his ass!
title: Robert & Nolan
